titles.title: Microbead-Free Waters Act of 2015
A bill to prohibit the sale or distribution of cosmetics containing synthetic plastic microbeads.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
5/21/2015--Introduced. Microbead-Free Waters Act of 2015
This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to ban cosmetics that contain synthetic plastic microbeads beginning on January 1, 2018.
